name: linear-companion
title: Linear Companion
description: Integrate LifeOS workflows directly into Linear to streamline life management and boost productivity.
author: sfkmk

preferences.name: searchDirectory
preferences.title: Search Directory
preferences.description: The root directory to search for project folders recursively. Defaults to home directory.
preferences.label: Projects Root

preferences.name: newFolderLocation
preferences.title: New Folder Location
preferences.description: Where new project folders should be created.
preferences.label: New Folders Root

preferences.name: allowEmojis
preferences.title: Folder Naming
preferences.label: Allow Emojis
preferences.description: Allow emojis in folder names. If unchecked, they will be removed.

commands.name: open-issue-folder
commands.title: Open Issue Folder
commands.description: Opens the local folder corresponding to the current Linear issue.

preferences.name: autoCreateFolders
preferences.title: Auto-create Missing Folders
preferences.description: Automatically create a folder inside your 'New Folder Location' if none is found for the current issue.
preferences.label: Auto-create folders

commands.name: query-issue-folder
commands.title: Query Issue Folder
commands.description: Find folders matching a Linear Issue ID.

commands.name: copy-issue-id
commands.title: Copy Issue ID
commands.description: Copy the Issue ID from the active Linear window.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the `prepublishOnly` script and rerun `npm publish` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use `npm run publish` instead.

" && exit 1
